name: DraftReviewForm

text.value: What accomplishments are you proud of? What led to this success?
In what areas would you like to improve? What means do you need to succeed?
Company’s values Our values are just as important as technical skills. We invite you to reflect on the way you live the following values.
You share information and insight easily before being asked to do so. You communicate concisely and clearly. You are transparent about both positive AND negative information.
You lend a hand when your teammates need you. You contribute to the company’s team spirit.

You challenge the status-quo and experiment with new and different ideas. You act in the company’s interest, not just your team’s. You are focused on client satisfaction (internal and/or external). You do your best at all times.
Do you have the necessary means / tools / knowledge to effectively do your job? What training could help you achieve your goals?

description: Page generated with Bonita UI designer
